9.label: Enable/Disable Scene Control
9.description: Send scene commands to hub on physical paddle presses.

11.label: Enable Local and Z-Wave Control
11.description: Enable or disable local control at the switch and Z-Wave control.

options.label: Local control disabled, Z-Wave control enabled
Local control and Z-Wave control enabled
Local control and Z-Wave control disabled

13.label: Reporting Behavior When Physical Control Is Disabled
13.description: Enable or disable reporting on/off status and changing LED indicator state even if physical and Z-Wave control is disabled.

metadata.inclusion:
1. Initiate inclusion (pairing) in the app (or web interface).
2. Tap the upper paddle of the switch 3 times.
3. The LED indicator will blink to signal communication and stay on/off when communication is concluded
metadata.exclusion:
1. Bring your Z-Wave gateway (hub) close to the switch if possible
2. Put the Z-Wave hub into exclusion mode 
3. Tap the lower paddle on the switch 3 times quickly
4. Your hub will confirm exclusion and the device will disappear from your controller's device list
metadata.reset:
If your primary controller is missing or inoperable, you may need to reset the device to factory settings. To complete the reset process manually, tap-tap-tap’n’hold the upper paddle for at least 10 seconds. The LED indicator will flash to confirm successful reset.
NOTE: All previously recorded activity and custom settings will be erased from the device’s memory
